#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int n,count=0;
    while(1)
    {
        count+=1;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n==0)
            break;
        int a[n],i,sum=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            sum += a[i];
        }
        int min = sum/n,ans=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]<min)
                ans += min-a[i];
        }
        printf("Set #%d\n",count);
        printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
